comments.content: I'm probably but I see Paul Renner's [Futura](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317071303/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/futura)... [SH version](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317071303/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/futura-sh) by Scangraphic has the lightest weight of Futura I'm aware of.
